function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate air quality monitoring leading to potential spread of contagious diseases like COVID-19.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and potential outbreaks within the building or facility.","Mitigation":"Implementing real-time air quality monitoring and ventilation systems, as well as establishing protocols for responding to poor air quality.","Technologies":"IoT sensors, edge computing, and cloud-based data analysis for real-time monitoring. Advanced ventilation systems for air quality improvement.","People":"Occupants of public and private buildings, employees in industrial facilities.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities."}]}
